# [Interview #1067: Steelheart Release Party, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1067#1)

#### Question

Your Korean phrase in Alcatraz, what was that?

#### Brandon Sanderson

"I don't speak Korean" is what I believe it says.
